product_name: Novara Kicker Road Bike Shorts - Boys'
long_description: The Novara Kicker road bike shorts for boys get his seat in the saddle and his toes to the pedals. 4-way stretch fabric and 4-panel construction provide support for hard-working muscles; moisture-wicking, quick-drying finish increases comfort. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Pre-curved chamois conforms to body's contours using a high-density, open-cell foam for comfort in the saddle. Microfiber chamois is soft and moisture wicking, with air channels for maximum breathability. Smooth turned-elastic waist seam eliminates chafing. Gripper elastic at leg hems keep the Novara Kicker road bike shorts in place. Machine washable for easy care.
